sentences.en: A plastic surgeon can remove the top layer of skin.
sentences.cn: 整形外科医生可以除去最表层的皮肤。

sentences.en: He followed his father and became a surgeon.
sentences.cn: 他子承父业，成为了一名外科医生。

sentences.en: He knew that under the surgeon's knife he would surely die.
sentences.cn: 他知道他必定会死在外科医生刀下.

sentences.en: His injuries were not such as to need a surgeon.
sentences.cn: 他的伤还不是那种需要外科医生治的伤.

sentences.en: His proficiency as a surgeon is well known.
sentences.cn: 他作为一名外科医生的水平是有名的.

sentences.en: Only your family doctor can refer you to a surgeon.
sentences.cn: 只有你的家庭医生才能把你介绍给外科医生。

sentences.en: Shirley's brother is now a consultant heart surgeon in Sweden.
sentences.cn: 雪利的兄弟现在在瑞典做心脏外科高级顾问医师。

sentences.en: Surgeon General's warning: cigarette smoking causes cancer
sentences.cn: 卫生局长提醒大家：吸烟致癌

sentences.en: The surgeon applied some ointment to my burnt fingers.
sentences.cn: 外科医生在我烧伤的指头上敷了一些药膏.

sentences.en: The surgeon cut through connective tissue to expose the bone.
sentences.cn: 外科医生割开结缔组织,让骨头露出来.

sentences.en: The surgeon healed the soldier's bullet wound in the leg.
sentences.cn: 医生治好了那位士兵腿部的枪伤.

sentences.en: The surgeon sewed up the wound.
The young surgeon showed exceptional competence.
sentences.cn: 这位年轻的外科医生具有不寻常的才干.

sentences.en: We must be as impersonal as a surgeon with his knife.
sentences.cn: 我们必须像外科医生拿手术刀时一样冷静客观，不受任何感情影响。
